login.title: Log in with Discord
login.subtitle: Manage your bot from one place
login.description: Powerful Discord bot with leveling system, moderation, giveaways, reaction roles and much more. Everything configurable via web panel.
login.featuresSubtitle: KiraEvo offers all features needed to manage your Discord community.
login.ctaDescription: Add KiraEvo to your server and configure everything in minutes.

features.automodDesc: Automatic message moderation, word and link filtering.
features.levelingDesc: Reward active users with XP and level roles.
features.giveawaysDesc: Organize contests with automatic winner selection.
features.reactionRolesDesc: Let users choose roles through reactions.
features.customCommandsDesc: Create custom text commands for your server.
features.webDashboardDesc: Easy configuration of everything via browser.

login.pricingSubtitle: Unlock the full potential of KiraEvo for your server

automod.antiFloodDesc: Detect and block rapid message flooding

automod.antiMentionDesc: Block messages with excessive user/role mentions
automod.bannedWordsDesc: Messages with these words will be deleted
automod.escalationDesc: Automatically increase punishments for repeat violations

automod.escalationExample: Example: 1st violation = warn, 2nd = mute 1h, 3rd = mute 24h, 4th = kick, 5th = ban

tempVoice.info2: The bot creates a new voice channel and moves the user into it
tempVoice.info3: When the channel is empty, it is automatically deleted after the configured timeout
tempVoice.info4: The bot needs Manage Channels and Move Members permissions
tempVoice.info5: Created channels inherit permissions from the parent category

music.info2: Bot searches YouTube, Spotify, and SoundCloud for the song

music.info5: Bot needs Connect and Speak permissions in the voice channel

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers and learn how to use KiraEvo

faq.howToAddBot: How do I add KiraEvo to my server?
faq.howToAddBotAnswer: Click 'Add Bot' on the landing page or dashboard. You'll be redirected to Discord to authorize the bot. Select your server and confirm the permissions.
faq.howToActivateLicense: How do I activate a license?
faq.howToActivateLicenseAnswer: Go to 'Activate License' in the sidebar. Enter your license key and select the server you want to activate it on. Premium and VIP licenses unlock additional modules and features.
faq.howToConfigureModules: How do I configure bot modules?
faq.howToConfigureModulesAnswer: Navigate to your server dashboard, then click on any module card to open its configuration. Use the toggle switch on each card to enable/disable modules.
faq.licenseTiersAnswer: Free: basic features. Premium: advanced modules, custom commands, leveling. VIP: all features, priority support, higher limits, exclusive modules.
faq.licenseExpiry: What happens when my license expires?
faq.licenseExpiryAnswer: Premium features will be disabled, but basic bot functionality remains. Your configuration is saved and will be restored when you renew.
faq.licenseTransfer: Can I transfer my license to another server?
faq.licenseTransferAnswer: Yes, you can deactivate a license from one server and activate it on another through the 'My Licenses' page.
faq.automodSetup: How do I set up AutoMod?
faq.automodSetupAnswer: Go to your server dashboard > AutoMod module. Enable the filters you need (spam, links, caps, etc.) and configure thresholds and actions for each filter type.
faq.moderationLogs: Where can I see moderation logs?
faq.moderationLogsAnswer: Click 'Moderation Logs' in the sidebar to view all moderation actions across your servers.
faq.levelingSetup: How does the leveling system work?
faq.levelingSetupAnswer: Enable the Leveling module in your server dashboard. Users earn XP by chatting. Configure XP rates, level-up messages, role rewards, and ignored channels.
faq.ticketSystem: How do I set up tickets?
faq.ticketSystemAnswer: Enable Tickets in your server dashboard. Create categories, configure the ticket panel, and send it to a channel.
faq.customCommandsAnswer: Yes! Go to Custom Commands in your server dashboard. Create slash commands with custom responses, embeds, and actions. Available with Premium and VIP licenses.

guide.automod: Automatic content filtering and spam protection
guide.leveling: XP system with level roles and leaderboards
guide.moderation: Warn, mute, ban commands and logging

download.title: Download KiraEvo App
download.subtitle: Manage your Discord bot on the go with our Android app
download.step1: Download the APK file by clicking the button above.
download.step2: Open your device Settings > Security and enable "Install from unknown sources" (or allow your browser to install apps).
download.step3: Open the downloaded file and follow the installation prompts.

onboarding.welcomeDesc: Let's get you set up in just a few steps. We'll guide you through adding a server, activating your license, and configuring your first module.
onboarding.addServerDesc: Head to 'Servers' to see your Discord servers. Click on any server to start managing it with KiraEvo.
onboarding.activateLicenseDesc: Go to 'Activate License' to enter your license key. This unlocks Premium or VIP features for your server.
onboarding.configureModulesDesc: Visit your server dashboard to enable and configure modules like AutoMod, Leveling, Tickets, and more.
